content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code tristresse50 for 50% off the original price or use the code tristresse100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support these elegant crochet dangle earrings are the perfect blend of sophistication and handmade charm crafted with delicate fingering weight yarn they are lightweight and comfortable to wear making them ideal for both everyday wear and special occasions with a simple yet striking design these earrings are quick to make even for beginners and offer a stylish way to add a unique touch to your outfit whether you re treating yourself or gifting a loved one these earrings are sure to impress with their refined beauty and intricate look this pattern is made in fingering weight yarn with a 3 5mm hook any fiber will work good for these earrings all my samples were made in fingering weight wool these earrings are worked in the round using the classic and timeless granny square pattern these earrings are one granny square round so they are incredibly quick to make gauge is not crucial in such a small piece this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect dangle earring size they are very lightweight and give off a playful and boho vibe this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques there are also photos to show how to add the hook and jump ring there is a note at the end of the pattern talking about optional stiffening options if you are interested in that i recommend you read that before starting thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my amazing testers divavonpurl /people/divavonpurl and lemonyloops /people/lemonyloops this pattern wouldn t be possible without you
